text: r/anime's Favorite Anime of the 00's r/anime users were presented with a ballot with up to 10 slots to fill in. The #1 slot gets 2 points, and the rest get 1. In total, 1308 users submitted ballots. The Top 25 in terms of points are listed below, along with how many times each placed in first, second, and third. A complete Top 100 is included in the comments of this post.
